name: Wwise Project File
summary: Learn about .WPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WPROJ files are saved in an XML format. They are saved with several other directories and files that store audio assets and audio settings.

instructions:
To open a Wwise Project file (.wproj), you need to have the Wwise software installed on your computer. The Wwise software is available for free download from the Audiokinetic website.

Once you have installed the Wwise software on your computer, follow these steps to open a Wwise Project file:

Launch the Wwise software.In the Wwise project launcher, click the “Open Existing Project” button.In the Open dialog box, navigate to the folder where your Wwise Project file is stored.Select the Wwise Project file you want to open and click the “Open” button.

The Wwise software will then load the Wwise Project file and all of its associated audio assets and settings. You can then edit and modify the project as needed using the various tools and features provided by the Wwise software.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
